title: Mailvox: hypocrites!
author: VD
content_html:
MW is underwhelmed by the public school defenders:


Thank you for your articles regarding homeschooling. My first thought about the non-homeschoolers arguments against homeschooling parents is… ” And expelling children when they become too much to handle, sending children to the juvenile justice system lock-up, and the recent tazering of a six year old is not child abuse?” When government employed officials decide that a child can no longer be in public school for their own reasons, it is okay. Those children in most cases are left to wander the streets while their parents work to survive. However, if a citizen decides on their own and for their own child that their child should not attend public school because they feel there are abuses in the public system, that is wrong. What a bunch of hypocrites!

What she said….
